hero.description: ESOLTECH Co., Ltd. was established in 2000 with a capital of 300 million KRW, annual revenue of 2 billion KRW, and a team of 30 employees. Located in Jungangdong, Seongsan-gu, Changwon-si, Gyeongnam, we specialize in IT outsourcing, ERP, MES, PLM system development and operations, and smart factory solutions.

hero.subDescription: From web development to AI, ESOLTECH supports your digital transformation with cutting-edge technology. We have over 10 years of experience and 200+ completed projects.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Start your project in 3 simple steps

steps.title: Consultation & Planning
steps.description: We analyze your business requirements and propose the optimal technology solutions. Together we define the project scope and timeline.

steps.title: Development & Testing
steps.description: Using agile methodology for rapid development and thorough QA to deliver stable, reliable results.

steps.title: Deployment & Operations
steps.description: We safely deploy your service and provide continuous monitoring and maintenance support.

features.title: Core Capabilities
features.subtitle: Delivering the best results with diverse tech stacks and extensive experience

items.title: Web Development
items.description: We develop high-performance responsive web applications using cutting-edge frameworks like React and Next.js.

items.title: Mobile Apps
items.description: We develop iOS/Android native and cross-platform apps to deliver the optimal mobile experience.

items.title: Cloud Infrastructure
items.description: We design and build reliable, scalable cloud infrastructure based on AWS, GCP, and Azure.

items.title: AI & Machine Learning
items.description: We drive innovation by integrating AI technologies including data analysis, NLP, and computer vision into your business.

items.title: Security Solutions
items.description: We provide comprehensive security solutions including vulnerability analysis, security audits, and intrusion detection systems.

items.title: Data Analytics
items.description: We build dashboards, BI tools, and real-time analytics systems to support data-driven decision making.

pricing.title: Service Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the right plan for your project scale

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: The perfect plan for growing businesses

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? Feel free to reach out anytime

items.question: How long does project development take?
items.answer: It depends on the scale and complexity, but generally small websites take 4-6 weeks, medium apps take 2-4 months, and large systems take 4-8 months. We'll provide an accurate timeline after consultation.

items.question: How is maintenance handled?
items.answer: All plans include a free maintenance period. After that, we offer monthly maintenance contracts covering bug fixes, feature updates, and server monitoring.

items.question: What tech stack do you use?
items.answer: For frontend we primarily use React, Next.js, and Vue.js. For backend, Node.js, Python, and Java. We leverage AWS and GCP for cloud, and recommend the optimal tech stack based on project characteristics.

items.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
items.answer: Yes, we support API integration with existing ERP, CRM, and legacy systems. Our extensive experience with data migration and system integration ensures seamless connectivity.

items.question: How can I track project progress?
items.answer: We provide weekly sprint reviews and monthly progress reports. We also share real-time updates through collaboration tools like Jira and Slack, with a dedicated PM assigned to your project.

ctaFooter.title: Start Your Project Today
ctaFooter.description: Get a free consultation for the optimal IT solution. Our expert consultants will guide you with a technology strategy aligned to your business goals.
